text:
-Cio... filhote... poção... – O outro alfa diz entre suspiros, ele estava atrás dos dois companheiros, o rapaz apenas pensava uma coisa os queria dentro dele, sentia-se todo lubrificado com o pensamento e pronto para tê-los dentro de si... solta um gemido arrastado se esfregando ainda mais contra quem lhe segurava.
-Filhote... eu q-quero um – murmura entre beijos e mordidas no pescoço ali.
-Vão para o quarto e deem o supressor a ele, irei passar na sala de Slughorn e pegar uma poção... e avisar Mc.Gonagall que não irão poder dar as aulas da tarde – a mulher fala de novo, e o pequeno começava a se sentir frustrado e muito quente, os alfas estavam ali e não lhe tocavam de jeito nenhum, seu pênis implorava para ser tocado, seu buraco implorava para ser estocado sem dó por eles.
trans:
- Heat... puppy... potion... – The other alpha says between sighs, standing behind the two companions. The young man could only think of one thing: he wanted them inside him. Just the thought made him feel slick and ready to take them in... He let out a drawn-out moan, rubbing himself even more against the one holding him.
- Puppy... I-I want one, he murmurs between kisses and bites on the neck.
- Take him to the bedroom and give him the suppressant. I’ll stop by Slughorn’s office to grab a potion... and let McGonagall know you won’t be able to teach the afternoon classes, – the woman says again, as the small one started feeling frustrated and unbearably hot. The alphas were right there, and none of them were touching him at all. His cock was begging for attention, and his hole was pleading to be pounded without mercy by them.
